content: designed for the 2025 minnesota yarn shop hop our theme for the hop was a garden path and this pattern with different stitches perfectly represents the different textures of a garden path this pattern has instructions for either a bag or a cowl bag size 10 w x 12 h cowl size 12 w x 12 h our yarn was dyed by miss babs and we just love it click here to see the yarn 1 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/meander---shop-hop-yarn-2025-x89088515 htm
